# <a name="insert-pictures-in-an-email-message-or-calendar-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="44cfd-102">Insira imagens em uma mensagem de e-mail ou evento de calendário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44cfd-102">Insert pictures in an email message or calendar event</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="44cfd-103">Pode inserir fotos, gifs ou clipart do seu computador ou OneDrive como imagens inline nas suas Outlook.com mensagens de correio eletrónico, eventos de calendário ou assinatura de e-mail.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44cfd-103">You can insert photos, gifs, or clipart from your computer or OneDrive as inline images in your Outlook.com email messages, calendar events, or email signature.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="44cfd-104">Comece a compor uma mensagem ou a criar um evento de calendário.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44cfd-104">Begin composing a message or creating a calendar event.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="44cfd-105">Selecione o ícone **inline de imagens inserir**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44cfd-105">Select the **Insert pictures inline** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="44cfd-106">na parte inferior da janela de composição (ao lado do ícone **Anexar**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44cfd-106">at the bottom of the compose window (next to the **Attach** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="44cfd-107">).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44cfd-107">).</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="44cfd-108">Escolha a imagem que pretende inserir e **selecione Open**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44cfd-108">Choose the picture you want to insert and select **Open**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="44cfd-109">Arraste os cantos para redimensionar a imagem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44cfd-109">Drag the corners to resize the image.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="44cfd-110">Clique na imagem para ver as opções de formatação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44cfd-110">Right-click the image to see formatting options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="44cfd-111">Leia mais sobre como [anexar ficheiros em Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44cfd-111">Read more about how to [attach files in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
